Zotero | iOS Developer | Remote | Full-Time

Zotero is an open-source research tool that helps people collect, organize, cite, and share their research. It's recommended by most universities and used by millions of students, scholars, scientists, and researchers worldwide.

We're building our first iOS app, and we're looking for an experienced iOS developer who can lead that effort, joining a small, remote-only team and a vibrant global open-source community. As a core Zotero developer, you'll play a critical role in coming up with new ways to help people manage their research more effectively.

More info: https://www.zotero.org/jobs
